DOC.brief_summary: All eligible patient invite use electronic monitoring medication ( MEMS ) next six month . After two month MEMS enrol patient randomize intervention group control group . The intervention group submit four social-psycho session pre-trained health professional . The control group receive usual care health service . The study compare rate adherence antiretroviral therapy intervention group control group . The duration study six month . The analysis base `` intention-to-treat .
